articles.author: Morgan Sloss
articles.title: People Are Calling Out Their Significant Others' Most Shocking Behavior, And It Ranges From Hilarious To Heartbreaking
articles.description: "I almost died in the hospital when my appendix ruptured. My fiancé was late getting there because he was cheating on me."
articles.content: "I had to realize that every time he claimed he worked late or 'ran errands,' he was with her. Every time he 'went to bed early,' he was in our bedroom sexting her or talking on the phone. The one th… [+780 chars]

articles.title: 9 Times Marvel Actors Stood Up For Their Costars, And 7 Times They Called Each Other Out
articles.description: The rest of the MCU needs to take notes from Don Cheadle!
articles.content: Marvel Studios president, Feige, told CinemaBlend, "Everybody knew he was an amazing actor. But he hadn't been an action star. He wasn't a marquee star, necessarily. And we quickly realized the risk,… [+127 chars]
